tag_list: balderton-capital, vc, startups, tech, london, paris, funding
overview:
Andrew is an Associate at Balderton Capital, covering a range of areas including consumer internet, new media and mobile.

Prior to joining Balderton, Andrew worked with McKinsey & Company, advising clients in telecom and media sectors in the UK, India and the Middle East. Previously, Andrew spent time with a number of tech start-ups and financial services companies.

Andrew holds a MA in International Policy Studies from Stanford University, where he also taught Economics, and an MA in Economics from Cambridge University.
